decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings and supporting document(s): Location Plan; 102 (P) (Existing Basement, Ground and First Floor Plans); 103 (P) (Existing Loft Floor and Roof Plans); 104 (P) (Existing Front and Rear Elevations); 105 (P) (Existing Side Elevations); 106 (P) Amendment B (Proposed Basement, Ground and First Floor Plans); 107 (P) Amendment B (Proposed Loft Floor and Roof Plans); 108 (P) Amendment B (Proposed Front and Rear Elevations); 109 (P) Amendment B (Proposed Side Elevations); 110 (P) Amendment B (Existing and Proposed Sections AA); 111 (P) Amendment B (Existing and Proposed Sections BB); 112 (P) (Proposed Block and Location Plans); Supporting Document "Flood Risk Assessment".
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
